title: Grapefruit and ginger meringue pie
description: This recipe uses Italian meringue which is a little harder to make than the usual meringue, but it is more stable so better suited to piping.For this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in round loose-bottomed fluted tart tin, a freestanding mixer with whisk attachment, a large piping bag fitted with a large open star nozzle, a chef’s blowtorch and a sugar thermometer.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
2 pink grapefruit, juice and zest only
70g/2½oz fresh root ginger, peeled and sliced
